cnbc.summary: The provider of software for defense agencies jumped about 3% on Friday to a record, ranking the company among the top 20 U.S. firms by market value.

cnbc.summary: Shengjia Zhao will work directly with Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the former CEO of Scale AI and now Meta's chief AI officer.

cnbc.title: NFL will fine more than 100 players for reselling Super Bowl tickets at a profit
cnbc.summary: Violators will be fined up to 2 times the face value of the tickets and could lose the ability to purchase future NFL tickets, according to a memo.

cnbc.title: Intel drops 8% as chipmaker's foundry business axes projects, struggles to find customers
cnbc.summary: Intel's stock dropped 8% after the chipmaker said it would slash foundry costs in its latest attempt to turn around its struggling business.
